title: Battles of Giorgland: The Legend of White Giorgi and Friends
description: *Based on Georgian Mythology.Young god Giorgi, who has no fame or reputation, admires the mighty goddess of the sky, Tamar. His best friend is Ochokochi, a faun god. He admires the goddess of the hunt and the forest, Dali, who pays no attention to him, yet is a close friend to Giorgi.Giorgi and Ochokochi decide to embark on a dangerous journey to become heroes and gain the goddesses' love.
author: Tamuna Tsertsvadze
